name: Craftbound - MMO Idle RPG
description:
Craftbound is an MMORPG idle/incremental game with a clean interface and charming pixel art. Featuring many skills, combined with a player based economy, and in-depth mechanics.
Enjoy everything you love about your favorite MMORPG’s —without the time investment. Craftbound is accessible to all players, with no pay-to-win or paywalled content. Rewarded video ads and in-app purchases are completely up-to you.
Begin your idle adventure, and join the growing global community.
FEATURES
- Player based economy and trading market.
- Advanced mechanics for idle veterans, and simple mode for casual players.
- Travel across the beautifully crafted world map with unique locations.
- Hundreds of items including rare’s, epics and legendaries.
- Customisable character with unlock-able cosmetics.
- Cloud saving, fast native performance, real-time notifications, and so much more!
Craftbound is still in early access, and will evolve as you play, and give feedback. New updates and content will be continuously added. Your progress will never be reset.
An internet connection is required to play, however idle progress continues while offline.
